Text: RISIFundacion Chile ConferenceRegister today for the th RISIFundacin Chile Conference Alternatives to Japan and the US Where are the Markets for the Southern Hemispheres Rapidly Increasing Supplies of Forest Products November Concepcin Chile To be held in conjuction with EXPOCORMA the largest forest industry trade show in South America After the Conference join our field trip November to visit Chiles Radiata Pine and Eucalyptus plantations and several converting facilities sawmills panel plants and pulp and paper facilities This is a great opportunity to experience one of the most vibrant forest products industries in the world Join us Either return the registration form previously sent to you or click below for the program and registration form eventsrisihtml
